item.description:
Celebrate Constitution Day (officially on Monday, September 17) and support Ron Paul at this important Straw Poll event. More informaton on Constitution Day at http://www.constituti...

Noon to 6:00

Veteran's Park, Elm St. Manchester, NH 03101

A ticket (only for NH residents) to the straw poll is $10 and gets you lunch.

Group transport from Boston is $20. Lunch can be purchased seperately on site.

Booth space is available for organizations

This event will be a great opportunity to build the Ron Paul campaign in NH win.

Please make every effort to support our brothers and sisters in NH for this event. Let's start planning early and show Dr. Paul the support he has in New England.
item.name: New Hampshire Republican Rally & Straw Poll and Constitution Day Celebration
